Gitone command-line interface (CLI)
===================================

  :prog: camp

.. click:: cli.acmp_cli:acmp_cli
  :prog: acmp

  :prog: cam

  :prog: acm

.. click:: cli.amendp_cli:amendp_cli
  :prog: amendp

.. click:: cli.aamendp_cli:aamendp_cli
  :prog: aamendp

.. click:: cli.amend_cli:amend_cli
  :prog: amend

.. click:: cli.aamend_cli:aamend_cli
  :prog: aamend
